data.title: vs Zombies
data.meta_description:
Zombie films (http://www.imdb.com/list/Zu0aA0_BPKI/) with a title using the format "X vs Zombies" (or "Zombies vs X" and variants replacing "Zombies" with "Living Dead".

This form appeared relatively late in the game, with 1992's Urban Scumbags vs Countryside Zombies.

Ones yet to appear: Lesbians vs Zombies, Clowns vs Zombies, Frankenstein's Monster vs Zombies, Godzilla vs Zombies (my favourite idea), Reagan vs Zombies (probably worth a brain joke or two), Werewolves vs Zombies, Zombies vs Zombies, etc.

See also: of the Dead (http://www.imdb.com/list/kp1l-6E1xp0/) and Night of the Living (http://www.imdb.com/list/JhhDik-nDgg/) two more lists of mine that deal with other popular forms of zombie movie title. Someone else has an X Zombies (http://www.imdb.com/list/kp1l-6E1xp0/) list where X = ninjas, cowboys, etc.

Comments: As I don't have a Facebook account I cannot interact with the new comments system, so have switched it off. I will start a thread on the message board and link it in here shortly.
data.text:
Zombie films with a title using the format "X vs Zombies" (or "Zombies vs X" and variants replacing "Zombies" with "Living Dead".

This form appeared relatively late in the game, with 1992's Urban Scumbags vs Countryside Zombies.

Ones yet to appear: Lesbians vs Zombies, Clowns vs Zombies, Frankenstein's Monster vs Zombies, Godzilla vs Zombies (my favourite idea), Reagan vs Zombies (probably worth a brain joke or two), Werewolves vs Zombies, Zombies vs Zombies, etc.

See also: of the Dead and Night of the Living two more lists of mine that deal with other popular forms of zombie movie title. Someone else has an X Zombies list where X = ninjas, cowboys, etc.

Comments: As I don't have a Facebook account I cannot interact with the new comments system, so have switched it off. I will start a thread on the message board and link it in here shortly.
